0.title: The Shawshank Redemption
0.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

1.title: The Dark Knight
1.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

2.title: Inception
2.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

3.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
3.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordescription of Isengard.

4.title: Forrest Gump
4.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only descriptionire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

5.title: Pulp Fiction
5.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

6.title: Fight Club
6.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

7.title: Spirited Away
7.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

8.title: Interstellar
8.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

9.title: The Lion King
9.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
